title: Game Recharge Pack 1: UI-UX SFX
description: UI-UX Sound Effects With A Retro Vibe
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


With its retro vibe, update your game sound's vault with “GAME RECHARGE PACK 1,” the ultimate SOUND EFFECTS UI/UX pack tailored for game development. This comprehensive audio asset collection is designed to infuse your projects with dynamic sound effects that cover a wide range of categories, ensuring every aspect of your game resonates with players. From the immersive ambience of natural elements to the high-octane energy of action sequences, this pack has it all:


ACTIVATE DEACTIVATE: The quintessential sounds for interactive elements coming to life or powering down.

BEEP: Diverse beeps for in-game actions.

BODYFALL: Gamish thuds and impacts for character interactions.

BOILING BUBBLES: The simmering essence of liquids for environmental depth.

CAR DRIVING: The roar and hum of engines for realistic vehicular movement.

CARTOON: Whimsical effects for light-hearted and comedic moments.

CHOPPER: The rhythmic chopping of helicopter blades for aerial scenes.

CLICK: Sharp and clear clicks for user interface interactions.

CLOTHES: The rustle and swish of fabric for character movement.

DIGITAL NOISES: Bleeps, Beeps and boops for futuristic settings.

ELECTRICITY: The crackle and buzz of raw power.

FIRE: The crackling warmth or raging inferno of flames.

FLASH: Sudden bursts of light and energy captured in sound.

GEARS: The mechanical dance of interlocking parts.

GENERAL IMPACT: Generic body impacts

GENERAL OBJECT IMPACT: Generic object impacts

GUN PARTS: The metallic clicks and clacks of firearms.

GUNSHOTS: The definitive report of various firearms.

HORROR: Gamish chilling sounds to raise the hairs on your neck.

REWIND: Synthesized whirring rewind of tapes and time.

RINGING RESONANCE: The lingering tones of bells.

SCI-FI EXPLOSION: The boom of futuristic warfare.

SCI-FI COMPUTES: The processing power of advanced technology.

SCI-FI LASER WEAPON: The zap and sizzle of energy weapons.

SCI-FI WHOOSH: The swift movement of objects through space.

SMASH AND BREAK: The shattering of glass and the splintering of concret.

SWISH: The swift movement of objects through the air.

SWISHY BANG: The dramatic combination of motion and impact.

SWORD: The metallic ring of blades in combat.

TURBO: The high-speed whine of boosted engines.

WATER: The splash, rumble and flow of aquatic environments.
technicalDetails:
Features: 

BELOW ARE THE FOLDERED SFX CATEGORIES:--

BEEP - 7 SFX

BODYFALL - 19 SFX

BOILING BUBBLES - 3 SFX

CAR DRIVING - 4 SFX

CARTOON Mallets- 56 SFX

CHOPPER - 3 SFX

CLICK - 18 SFX

CLOTHES - 37 SFX

DIGITAL NOISES - 24 SFX

ELECTRICITY - 19 SFX

FIRE - 4 SFX

FLASH - 20 SFX

GEARS - 12 SFX

Mechanical Gears - 11

GENERAL IMPACT - 17 SFX

GENERAL OBJECT IMPACT - 20 SFX

GUN PARTS - 18 SFX

GUNSHOTS - 57 SFX

HORROR - 7 SFX

REWIND - 14 SFX

RINGING RESONANCE - 5 SFX

SCI-FI EXPLOSION - 68 SFX

SCI-FI COMPUTES - 6 SFX

SCI-FI LASER WEAPON - 14 SFX

SCI-FI WHOOSH - 14 SFX

SMASH AND BREAK - 7 SFX

SWISH - 20 SFX

SWISHY BANG - 12 SFX

SWORD - 17 SFX

TURBO - 19 SFX

WATER - 14 SFX



Number of Audio Waves: 579

Number of Audio Cues: 579

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Extra silences removed from the beginning of all files.
